nodes.bodyText: I decided to keep the VERSION specifier on the persistence-schema jar, so please revert all the changes to this file.  Otherwise, I'll just revert as part of #587
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -4,20 +4,18 @@ Builds and manages the multi-tenant FHIR R4 RDBMS schema (Db2). Includes Derby s
 
 # To Execute the fhir-persistence-schema

@@ -4,20 +4,18 @@ Builds and manages the multi-tenant FHIR R4 RDBMS schema (Db2). Includes Derby s
 
 # To Execute the fhir-persistence-schema

@@ -155,3 +155,58 @@ jobs:
       with:
         name: integration-test-results-${{ matrix.java }}
         path: SIT/integration-test-results
+  e2e-tests-windows:
+    runs-on: windows-latest
+    strategy:
+      matrix:
+        java: [ 'openjdk11' ]
+      fail-fast: false
+    steps:
+    - uses: actions/checkout@v1

@@ -155,3 +155,58 @@ jobs:
       with:
         name: integration-test-results-${{ matrix.java }}
         path: SIT/integration-test-results
+  e2e-tests-windows:
+    runs-on: windows-latest
+    strategy:
+      matrix:
+        java: [ 'openjdk11' ]
+      fail-fast: false
+    steps:
+    - uses: actions/checkout@v1
+    - name: Set up OpenJDK
+      uses: joschi/setup-jdk@v1
+      with:
+        java-version: ${{ matrix.java }}
+    - name: Build samples
+      shell: powershell
+      run: mvn -B install --file fhir-examples/pom.xml --no-transfer-progress
+    - name: Build parent without tests
+      shell: powershell
+      run: mvn -B install --file fhir-parent/pom.xml -DskipTests --no-transfer-progress
+    - name: Server Integration Tests
+      shell: powershell
+      run: |
+        & build/pre-integration-test.ps1

@@ -155,3 +155,58 @@ jobs:
       with:
         name: integration-test-results-${{ matrix.java }}
         path: SIT/integration-test-results
+  e2e-tests-windows:
+    runs-on: windows-latest
+    strategy:
+      matrix:
+        java: [ 'openjdk11' ]
+      fail-fast: false
+    steps:
+    - uses: actions/checkout@v1
+    - name: Set up OpenJDK
+      uses: joschi/setup-jdk@v1
+      with:
+        java-version: ${{ matrix.java }}
+    - name: Build samples
+      shell: powershell
+      run: mvn -B install --file fhir-examples/pom.xml --no-transfer-progress
+    - name: Build parent without tests
+      shell: powershell
+      run: mvn -B install --file fhir-parent/pom.xml -DskipTests --no-transfer-progress
+    - name: Server Integration Tests
+      shell: powershell
+      run: |
+        & build/pre-integration-test.ps1
